name: Idle Champions: Spelljammer Pilot Briv Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Briv (if you don't already own them) Spelljammer Pilot Briv Skin An Epic Feat for Briv 7 Gold Briv Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
